title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta, mix with bacon and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Add chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
